title: Can Anyone Identify? Retro Spring Break
content:
Have you seen any other examples of this?   
   
It somewhat resembles Jason Walcott's [Luxury Royale](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124319/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg9.html) (top of page). It also seems to have a custom or swash 'k'. I've looked through Parts 7 & 8 in my Script Font ID Guide and it doesn't seem to be anything I have collected so far, so I'll be wanting to get a sample if someone ID's this one.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: It could be custom, I can almost see small differences betwen the "e" and the "r".

I didn't see any more samples. I did see the same logo repeated. This suggests that this is just an image of some hand-drawn lettering.   
   
I also had Ignacio's feeling that those letters weren't exact duplicates.
